episode.description: Chinese lawyer Tang Shuai uses sign language to protect the legal rights of his clients who have hearing difficulties. He hopes for a law-abiding society that is more considerate to their needs.
episode.title: Direct Talk

episode.description: Famous for its "Freak Cabaret" performances, the Ukrainian music and theater band Dakh Daughters sings about the harsh situation in Ukraine. Its vocalist explains the thoughts behind the lyrics.
episode.title: Direct Talk

episode.description: Dominique Chen, known for his outstanding research in the field of information studies, talks about ways to achieve well-being through digital communications.
episode.title: Direct Talk

episode.content: Dr. Claire Wardle is on a mission to help the global public understand the dangers of disinformation and misinformation, which have proliferated with the rise of social media and now the coronavirus.
episode.description: Dr. Claire Wardle is on a mission to help the global public understand the dangers of disinformation and misinformation, which have proliferated with the rise of social media and now the coronavirus.
episode.subtitle: The Fight Against Misinformation: Claire Wardle / Social Media Expert
episode.title: Direct Talk

episode.content: Yukari Suzuki has been working for reconciliation between the Dutch, Japanese and Indonesian. How can people transcend division through dialogue?
episode.description: Yukari Suzuki has been working for reconciliation between the Dutch, Japanese and Indonesian. How can people transcend division through dialogue?
episode.subtitle: Bridging the Division: Yukari Tangena Suzuki / Chairperson "The Foundation Dialogue Netherlands-Japan-Indonesia"
episode.title: Direct Talk

episode.content: Mounir Biba, multiple world champion of Breaking, runs the project about breaking and coaching to support young people. He also contributed to the promotion of Breaking for Olympic sports inclusion.
episode.description: Mounir Biba, multiple world champion of Breaking, runs the project about breaking and coaching to support young people. He contributed also to the promotion of Breaking for Olympic sports inclusion.
episode.subtitle: Breaking Makes Everything Possible: Mounir Biba / Breaker/Motivational Coach
episode.title: Direct Talk
